long_description: Take cover from the rain, wind, sleet, and snow with the waterproof, breathable Marmot PreCip(R) Safari Hat. Waterproof, breathable NanoPro(TM) provides excellent protection while allowing moisture vapor to escape; NanoPro is more breathable than previous Marmot coating technology. Breathable polyester mesh lining wicks away moisture and dries quickly to keep you comfortable. Brushed polyester headband has the soft feel of flannel and traps warmth; it also helps manage moisture for comfort. Brim can be turned up and secured with internal magnets on both sides. Internal shockcord lets you adjust the size for just the right fit. Removable chin cord prevents the Marmot PreCip Safari Hat from flying away on windy days.
short_description: Take cover from the rain, wind, sleet, and snow with the waterproof, breathable Marmot PreCip(R) Safari Hat.
